doc.title: Le ravissement
doc.plot: A woman dressed in man's formal attire arrives at a black-tie affair and immediately sees the woman she intends to seduce. As the two exchange smoldering looks, the butch imagines some of what she hopes the evening will entail. She's well prepared for any mutually agreed upon ravishing, with condoms in her cigarette case and a latex glove visible in the inside pocket of her jacket.
